Lunarpine lunged forward at the tigers throat, he didn't have time at 
the moment to transform. his only thought was to teach this thing 
that nothing makes a meal of him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> The tiger stayed still until it could smell and hear where the wolf 
> was in the grass.  It steadied itself, getting it's self ready.
> 
> It looked and saw the grass moving and it pounced.  It's huge 
muscled 
> body pushing it upward and out towards Lunarpine.  It's pounce aim 
> was a little off and missed Lunarpine by a foot. Now it saw him.  
> It's huge k-9 teeth protruding out. It's huge paws ready to tear 
into 
> his prey and soon, his next meal.
